snippet: Economists said the Federal Reserve’s plan to buy mortgage-backed securities and other assets was a sign of its confidence in a nascent housing recovery.
abstract: Economists predict that the Federal Reserve’s ambitious effort to spur the economic recovery by aiding the housing market is likely to have only a modest effect on home sales, given the pervasive weakness in the real estate market.
lead_paragraph: Economists said the Federal Reserve’s plan to buy mortgage-backed securities and other assets was a sign of its confidence in a nascent housing recovery.

headline.seo: Analysts See Minor Boost for Housing in Fed Plan
headline.main: Analysts See Minor Boost for Housing in the Fed’s Plan
headline.print_headline: Analysts See Minor Boost for Housing in the Fed’s Plan
